components.name: Box
components.description: The Box component is a generic, theme-aware container with access to CSS utilities from MUI System.

props.name: children
props.description: The content of the component.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used for the root node.

props.name: sx
props.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

components.name: Container
components.description: The container centers your content horizontally. It's the most basic layout element.

props.name: children
props.description: The content of the component.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used for the root node.

props.name: disableGutters
props.description: If true, the left and right padding is removed.

props.name: fixed
props.description: Set the max-width to match the min-width of the current breakpoint.

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: Determine the max-width of the container.

props.name: sx
props.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

components.name: Grid
components.description: The Grid component works well for a layout with known columns.

props.name: children
props.description: The content of the component.

props.name: columns
props.description: The number of columns.

props.name: columnSpacing
props.description: Defines the horizontal space between the type item components.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used for the root node.

props.name: container
props.description: If true, the component will have the flex container behavior.

props.name: direction
props.description: Defines the flex-direction style property.

props.name: lg
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses for lg and wider screens.

props.name: lgOffset
props.description: If a number, it sets the margin-left equals to the number of columns for lg and wider screens.

props.name: md
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses for md and wider screens.

props.name: mdOffset
props.description: If a number, it sets the margin-left equals to the number of columns for md and wider screens.

props.name: rowSpacing
props.description: Defines the vertical space between the type item components.

props.name: size
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses.

props.name: sm
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses for sm and wider screens.

props.name: smOffset
props.description: If a number, it sets the margin-left equals to the number of columns for sm and wider screens.

props.name: spacing
props.description: Defines the space between the type item components.

props.name: sx
props.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

props.name: wrap
props.description: Defines the flex-wrap style property.

props.name: xl
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses for xl and wider screens.

props.name: xlOffset
props.description: If a number, it sets the margin-left equals to the number of columns for xl and wider screens.

props.name: xs
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses for xs and wider screens.

props.name: xsOffset
props.description: If a number, it sets the margin-left equals to the number of columns for xs and wider screens.

components.name: GridLegacy
components.description: The legacy Grid component (deprecated, use Grid instead).

props.name: alignContent
props.description: Defines the align-content style property.

props.name: alignItems
props.description: Defines the align-items style property.

props.name: children
props.description: The content of the component.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used for the root node.

props.name: container
props.description: If true, the component will have the flex container behavior.

props.name: direction
props.description: Defines the flex-direction style property.

props.name: item
props.description: If true, the component will have the flex item behavior.

props.name: justifyContent
props.description: Defines the justify-content style property.

props.name: lg
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses.

props.name: md
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses.

props.name: sm
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses.

props.name: spacing
props.description: Defines the space between the type item components.

props.name: sx
props.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

props.name: wrap
props.description: Defines the flex-wrap style property.

props.name: xl
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses.

props.name: xs
props.description: If a number, it sets the number of columns the grid item uses.

props.name: zeroMinWidth
props.description: If true, it sets min-width: 0 on the item.

components.name: Stack
components.description: The Stack component manages layout of immediate children along the vertical or horizontal axis with optional spacing and/or dividers between each child.

props.name: children
props.description: The content of the component.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used for the root node.

props.name: direction
props.description: Defines the flex-direction style property.

props.name: divider
props.description: Add an element between each child.

props.name: spacing
props.description: Defines the space between immediate children.

props.name: sx
props.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

props.name: useFlexGap
props.description: If true, the CSS flexbox gap is used instead of applying margin to children.

components.name: ImageList
components.description: Image lists display a collection of images in an organized grid.

props.name: children
props.description: The content of the component, normally ImageListItems.

props.name: cols
props.description: Number of columns.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used for the root node.

props.name: gap
props.description: The gap between items in px.

props.name: rowHeight
props.description: The height of one row in px.

props.name: sx
props.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

props.name: variant
props.description: The variant to use.

components.name: ImageListItem
components.description: Individual item in an image list.

props.name: children
props.description: The content of the component, normally an img.

props.name: cols
props.description: Width of the item in number of grid columns.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used for the root node.

props.name: rows
props.description: Height of the item in number of grid rows.

props.name: sx
props.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.
